answers.answer: You will get more ultrasounds, you will be monitored more so more appts, and most likely you'll be induced at 37 weeks since you have pre existing diabetes. Its just a precaution. Just make sure to eat healthy and keep your sugars as low as you can.

question: I just found out I'm 6 weeks pregnant! My first baby, and we couldn't be more thrilled. I've read a lot of articles about being a pregnant diabetic, but I was hoping to get a first hand opinion. Should I expect anything different?
title: Pregnancy with diabetes
